verses.text: And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* all that \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and withal how he had \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* all the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

Then \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* a \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* unto \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, So let the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add to me\add*, and \w more|strong="H3254"\w* also, if I \w make|strong="H7760"\w* not thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w* as the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of them by to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* about this \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

And when he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add that\add*, he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* for his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*, which \add belongeth\add* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w left|strong="H3240"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* there.

¶ But he himself \w went|strong="H1980"\w* a \w day’s|strong="H3117"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w* under \w a|strong="H0259"\w* juniper \w tree|strong="H7574"\w*: and he \w requested|strong="H7592"\w* for \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* that he might \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It is \w enough|strong="H7227"\w*; now, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w*; for I \add am\add* not \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than my \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 19.4 \ft for himself: Heb. for his life\f*

And as he \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* and \w slept|strong="H3462"\w* under \w a|strong="H0259"\w* juniper \w tree|strong="H7574"\w*, behold, then an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* \add and\add* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

And he \w looked|strong="H5027"\w*, and, behold, \add there was\add* a \w cake|strong="H5692"\w* baken on the \w coals|strong="H7529"\w*, and a \w cruse|strong="H6835"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* at his \w head|strong="H4763"\w*. And he did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and laid him \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 19.6 \ft head: Heb. bolster\f*

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w*, and \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* \add and\add* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; because the \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \add is\add* too \w great|strong="H7227"\w* for thee.

And he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* of that \w meat|strong="H0396"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w* unto \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w* the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* thither unto a \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, and \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* there; and, behold, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add came\add* to him, and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What doest thou here, \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have been \w very|strong="H7065"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* thy \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, thrown \w down|strong="H2040"\w* thine \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and I, \add even\add* I only, am \w left|strong="H3498"\w*; and they \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, to take it \w away|strong="H3947"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. And, behold, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, and a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w rent|strong="H6561"\w* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and brake in \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* the \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \add but\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add was\add* not in the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*: and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* an \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w*; \add but\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add was\add* not in the \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w*:

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; \add but\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add was\add* not in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* a \w still|strong="H1827"\w* \w small|strong="H1851"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

And it was \add so\add*, when \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, that he \w wrapped|strong="H3874"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* in his \w mantle|strong="H0155"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the entering \w in|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*. And, behold, \add there came\add* a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* unto him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What doest thou here, \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have been \w very|strong="H7065"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: because the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* thy \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, thrown \w down|strong="H2040"\w* thine \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and I, \add even\add* I only, am \w left|strong="H3498"\w*; and they \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, to take it \w away|strong="H3947"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w* on thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*: and when thou \w comest|strong="H0935"\w*, \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \add to be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*:

And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nimshi|strong="H5250"\w* shalt thou \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \add to be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w* of \w Abel-meholah|strong="H0065"\w* shalt thou \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \add to be\add* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* in thy room.\f + \fr 19.16 \ft Elisha: Gr. Eliseus\f*

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* him that \w escapeth|strong="H4422"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* shall \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w slay|strong="H4191"\w*: and him that \w escapeth|strong="H4422"\w* from the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* shall \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w slay|strong="H4191"\w*.

Yet I have \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \add me\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, all the \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* which have not \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w* unto \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and every \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* which hath not \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* him.\f + \fr 19.18 \ft I have…: or, I will leave\f*

¶ So he \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* thence, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w*, who \add was\add* \w plowing|strong="H2790"\w* \add with\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w yoke|strong="H6776"\w* \add of oxen\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and he with the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w*: and \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* by him, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* his \w mantle|strong="H0155"\w* upon him.

And he \w left|strong="H5800"\w* the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let me, I pray thee, \w kiss|strong="H5401"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and \add then\add* I will \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* thee. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Go \w back|strong="H3212"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*: for what have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to thee?\f + \fr 19.20 \ft Go…: Heb. Go return\f*

And he returned \w back|strong="H7725"\w* from \w him|strong="H0310"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w yoke|strong="H6776"\w* of \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2076"\w* them, and \w boiled|strong="H1310"\w* their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* with the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*. Then he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, and \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* unto him.
